data.comment: The match has started, with Mechelen kicking-off.
Goal! Nikola Storm gives Mechelen a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Regenboogstadion.
Zulte have kicked-off the second half at Regenboogstadion.
The home team have replaced Abdoulaye Sissako with Daniel Opare. This is the first substitution made today by Francky Dury.
In the minute 48, Goal! Geoffry Hairemans extends Mechelen's lead to 0-2.
Gianni Bruno strikes to reduce the deficit to 1-2 at Regenboogstadion.
Jean-Luc Dompe is on a sub for William Bianda for Zulte.
In the minute 64, William Togui is replacing Geoffry Hairemans for the away team.
Mechelen make their second substitution with Onur Kaya replacing Rob Schoofs.
Wouter Vrancken (Mechelen) is making a third substitution, with Issa Kabore replacing Nikola Storm.
In the minute 84, The home team replace Jannes Van Hecke with Jelle Vossen.
Mechelen's Joachim Van Damme has been booked in Waregem.
Onur Kaya (Mechelen) gets a yellow card.
The match is over. Final score 1-2.
